channel.title: Read Rust - Computer Science
channel.description: Computer Science posts on Read Rust

item.title: Memory Safety in Rust: A Case Study with C
item.description: To demonstrate the value of Rust's memory safety rules, I contrast the implementation of a simple vector library in C and Rust, highlighting where and how Rust's static analysis can prevent tricky memory errors.
item.dc:creator: Will Crichton
